description:
Job Title

Director, Brand Partnerships

Dotdash Meredith is hiring a Director with a background and focus in one of the following areas:

• Retail

• Food & Beverage

• Auto

• Travel

• Home

You will be an individual contributor accountable for driving strategic growth on a focused list of accounts. You will do this by creating and executing a roadmap for growth for your accounts that leverages content, commerce, data, media & more.

About Your Contributions:

• Represent the Dotdash Meredith Brand portfolio with digital industry expertise, professionalism and a point of view

• Continually educate yourself on your clients business challenges, and work to bring the clients advertising solutions which help to solve their business challenges

• Develop, maintain and grow strong relationships with client and agency partners across multiple levels of both organizations

• Strive to have strong relationships where you have intelligence about your client goals and objectives 'before the RFP'

• Sell a variety of solutions to clients including custom content, editorial sponsorships, mobile executions, programmatic, and demonstrate a curiosity for new and evolving products

• Forecast, track and report revenue contribution and performance with our internal tools

• Meet and exceed quarterly and annual revenue goals

About You:

• 8+ years of industry or sales experience

• Digital media sales or account management experience,

• Working collaboratively with sales support staff internally is in your DNA

• You have a positive attitude, enthusiasm, high energy, and a passion for excellence

• Results-driven orientation, superior client management skills, excellent follow-up and follow-through

• Independent self-starter who can get up and running quickly

• High degree of integrity and business ethics

• Willing to travel as needed

• College degree required

Pay Range

Salary: $105,000 - $150,000

Note: Posting is subject to change so please refer to career site for latest availability (SBJ-G337).
